Text: I've created an account just so I can tell you that you're awesome, I've been getting the AOTS and X-Play podcasts for years but because I live in the UK it's impossible (as far as I know) to watch full episodes so to have you uploading all the episodes every week is a godsend, I salute you sir, keep up the good work.

@DBR5000
Thanks for the kind words.
Most thanks go to Eclipse though for capping each episode. I just port them over to here.
I just want to do my part and help share when i can.
